alert.note: Alert for Leake (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 8:41AM CDT until March 26 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Edinburg affecting Leake County. Yockanookany River Near Kosciusko affecting Attala County. Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove affecting Leake County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tuscolameta Creek At Walnut Grove. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Agricultural land and low areas along and near the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 15.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 26.0 feet Thursday evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Tuscolameta Creek Walnut Grove 25.0 15.3 Tue 8 am CDT 22.3 25.7 25.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
